description:
Learn the tools that you will need to build a website without the knowledge of programming language.

Build any kind of website on wix with this tutorial.

  • Build entertainment, business website, blog
  • Configure SEO for your website
  • Create and blast newsletter for your website

Become a website developer without programming skill

Suitable for those without programming experience, those who can not write code or those who cannot afford the cost and time of learning programming language to start building any kind of website. Through this course of 18 lectures and 3 hours of content, you will learn the use of wix editor and established a strong understanding on the use of these the platform to create any kind of website. Each chapter closes with exercises putting your new learned skills into practical use immediately

starting with understanding the components of wix editor, the website development platform, this course will take you through planning website, creating website menu items, creating web pages, adding elements, apps and widget on webpages, styling webpages and elements, registering website domain, registering and connecting website to domain, configuring SEO for your website, optimizing your website for responsiveness and mobile view, creating and managing newsletter, creating and managing mail service, creating and managing website contacts.

I designed this program course to be understood by anybody who want to build any kind of website but do not understand any programming language.
title: How to create amazing websites without writing a single code
